posts.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
posts.content: This simple yet delicious pizza features a thin crust topped with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil. Bake at 475°F (245°C) for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
posts.author: Chef Marco

posts.title: Authentic Beef Tacos
posts.content: Season ground beef with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, and onion powder. Cook until browned, then serve in warm corn tortillas with diced onions, fresh cilantro, and a squeeze of lime. Top with your favorite salsa.
posts.author: Maria Sanchez

posts.title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
posts.content: Sauté arborio rice with shallots and garlic. Gradually add warm vegetable broth, stirring constantly. When rice is al dente, stir in sautéed wild mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and a knob of butter. Finish with fresh parsley.
posts.author: Giovanni Rossi
